Description:
Basic Qualifications: Requires a Bachelor’s degree (or international equivalent) from an accredited university and 4 or more years of relevant experience. If qualifying with a Master’s degree, 3 or more years of relevant professional experience.
2-3 years of professional experience working on large, industrial, construction projects.
Experience in performing, monitoring, and reviewing cost engineering functions, which include cost estimating, cost control, and cost analysis. 
Excellent written and oral communication skills, including strong English proficiency.
Proficiency basic software applications such as Excel, Word and PowerPoint.Job Details
